com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp

Class StatusServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.BigdataServlet
          • com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.BigdataRDFServlet
            • com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.StatusServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMimeTypes, Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class StatusServlet
extends BigdataRDFServlet
    A status page for the service. TODO The KB addressed by the request should also be displayed as metadata associated with the request. We should make this a restriction that can be placed onto the status page and make it easy to see the status for different KBs.
    Author:
    thompsonbry, martyncutcher
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • CANCEL_QUERY

        protected static final String CANCEL_QUERY
        The name of a request parameter used to cancel a running query (or any other kind of REST API operation). At least one QUERY_ID must also be specified. Queries specified by their QUERY_ID will be cancelled if they are still running.
        See Also:
        QUERY_ID, QueryHints.QUERYID, Constant Field Values

               throws IOException

        IOException

      • doGet

        protected void doGet(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
              throws IOException

        A status page. Options include:

        showQueries
        List SPARQL queries accepted by the SPARQL end point which are currently executing on the QueryEngine. The queries are listed in order of decreasing elapsed time. You can also specify showQueries=details to get a detailed breakdown of the query execution.
        queryId=<UUID> to specify the query(s) of interest. This parameter may appear zero or more times. When give, the response will include information only about the specified queries.
        showKBInfo
        Show some information about the AbstractTripleStore instance being served by this SPARQL end point.
        showNamespaces
        List the namespaces for the registered AbstractTripleStores.
        dumpJournal
        Provides low-level information about the backing Journal (if any).

        Overrides:
        doGet in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        All REST API operations should be cancelable from both REST API and workbench
